pages.title: Cooling Coil Conduit
pages.text: The <item>Cooling Coil Conduit/$ is a special <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/conduit)conduit/$ that sets the temperature of all <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ flowing through it to the <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)biome temperature/$.$(br2)They input <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ on one side, and output on the opposite side. They cannot face vertically, and have both a glass and crystal
